question:
Identify the personality with the help of given information:
  1. He was a great social reformer and considered Lord Sriman Narayan as the supreme Brahman
  2. He popularised the Bhakti (loving devotion) and Prapatti (total surrender to god)
  3. He initiated the bold step of admitting untouchables into the temple
  4. His 1000th birth anniversary was celebrated on May 1, 2017
  Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation: Ramanuja propagated the Sri Sampradaya as he was a devotee of Lord Sriman Narayan. He re-established and revitalised the Vedantic thought after a thorough and systematic refutation of non Vedic systems like Jainism and Buddhism. He popularised the Bhakti (loving devotion) and Prapatti (total surrender to God). He initiated the bold step of admitting untouchables into the temple. His 1000<sup>th</sup> birth anniversary was celebrated on May 1, 2017.
